info.name: Roblox in 2019 (NOW CUSTOMISABLE)
info.description:
Roblox in 2019 ~(ThatGuyLoc)~ V.4.0.0, based off GalactiCosmo's Roblox Old Light Theme.
Original version here: https://userstyles.org/styles/177302/roblox-old-light-theme-2019
info.additionalInfo:
{{---######---Latest Update News---######---}}
v.2.3.0 26/11/20
+Theme Screenshot update (The screenshot was too zoomed in, so I zoomed it out.)
+Fixed More Colours
+Fixed a small padding error
+Added more BTRoblox fixes
v.3.0.1 29/11/20
+Big code organisation! (The code was very messy, so I organised it by putting different things into differnet sections!)
v.4.0.0 11/12/20 
+ Better organisation and starting to use the offical styleguide for roblox.com as a base.
link: https://web.roblox.com/reference/styleguide
v.5.0.0 16/12/20
+ Theme is customisable!
{{---######---Theme Announcement---######---}}
I'm thinking of moving this theme to greasyfork, because userstyles is so slow.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

{{---######---OTHER THEMES BY ME---######---}}
Roblox Old Dark Theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/190904
Roblox 2017/2018 Theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/191623
Roblox+ OBC (Coming Soon!)

Sorry for the lack of updates, I was working on this organisation,
and yes, I'm working on the trading page.
